text: I run a 12-person SEO agency. Before Dofollo, internal linking was a client conversation I dreaded — too manual, too slow. Now I run a full link audit in minutes, show clients their visual link graph, and charge for it as a premium service. Game changer.
name: Rachel M.

text: Dofollo found 140 orphan pages on a site I thought I knew inside-out. That's 140 pages Google was basically ignoring. Fixed them in one session. Rankings moved within 4 weeks. I should have had this tool two years ago.
name: Priya S.

text: The anchor text suggestions are scary good. It doesn't just guess — it reads the surrounding content and picks anchors that feel natural. Our content team thought I wrote them manually. I don't correct them.
name: James T.

text: We have 3,000+ product pages. Dofollo mapped our full internal link structure overnight and highlighted exactly where link equity was leaking. One audit session recovered pages that hadn't ranked in 18 months.
name: Sofia K.

text: I was spending 6 hours per client just on internal linking audits. Dofollo does it in under 10 minutes and the output is cleaner than anything I could produce manually. I've basically hired a senior intern that never sleeps.
name: Marcus L.

text: The Competitor Link Map feature is where things get wild. I pulled a competitor's internal structure, spotted a cluster they were using to funnel authority to their money pages, copied the pattern for our site. We ranked above them 6 weeks later.
name: Tanvir H.

text: One-click publishing is not a gimmick — it genuinely pushed 300+ approved links to WordPress without me touching a single post. My dev team was confused why I stopped filing tickets for link updates. Dofollo replaced that entire workflow.
name: Claire D.

text: We connect Google Search Console directly to Dofollo. It prioritizes link placements based on actual traffic and impressions data — not just keyword guesses. That data-first approach is exactly what separates it from every other tool I've tried.
name: Omar R.
